topic.title: How to Fix Text Bleeding From Table Cells

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p: Slim tables or tables that have many columns make the text from the cells to be confined to a small horizontal space. Long words would bleed outside the cell boundaries. To fix this, hyphenation is enable by default in tables, thus making the words spread on multiple lines.
